wikipedia_page.main: Richard Grenville Williams is a Welsh former cricketer active from 1974 to 1992 who played for Northamptonshire (Northants). He was born in Bangor, Caernarvonshire on 10 August 1957. He appeared in 284 first-class matches as a righthanded batsman who bowled off spin. He scored 11,817 runs with a highest score of 175 not out, one of eighteen centuries, and took 376 wickets with a best performance of seven for 73.
